title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, February 23, 2022
description: On this day in 1898 the French novelist Émile Zola was found guilty of libel for writing "J'accuse," an exposee on how the French Government had convicted an innocent man.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1898 the French novelist Émile Zola was found guilty of libel for writing "J'accuse," an exposee on how the French Government had convicted an innocent man.
